level.heading: COMMERCIAL APPLICATORS[COLON] ELIGIBILITY FOR CERTIFICATION (ยง 20-2302)

level.text: Each applicant for certification as a commercial applicator shall demonstrate to the Director that he or she has at least one (1) of the following:

One (1) year of experience acceptable to the Director as a full-time registered employee engaged in those categories in which the applicant seeks to be certified. Proof of this experience may include affidavits from former employers, certification or licensure from other states or the federal government, or other measures acceptable to the Director;

A degree or certification from an accredited college or university with specialized training acceptable to the Director in the categories in which the applicant seeks to be certified. One (1) year of this specialized training may be considered equivalent to one (1) year of practical experience; or
A combination of training and experience acceptable to the Director. This combination shall total one (1) year.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 3044 (October 6, 1978), incorporating Proposed Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 2118 (August 25, 1978).
